document_data.name: Smithy's Choice
document_data.mainbody: '''Smithy's Choice''' was a small blacksmiths' shop in the western part of the city of [[Phlan]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1350}}, the Smithy's Choice operated out of the western part of Phlan, not far from the [[Traitor's Gate]] that led to the eastern Phlan. The smith was happy to sell several mundane sets of armor, including more exotic ''[[elfin chain]]''.
